text: The Unbearable Lightness of Being () is a 1984 novel by Milan Kundera, about two women, two men, a dog and their lives in the 1968 Prague Spring period of Czechoslovak history. The original Czech text was published the following year. ==Other websites== *SparkNotes *An essay written by Giuseppe Raudino Category:1984 books Category:Czech culture Category:Adultery in fiction
